name: RunFromFileSystemTask
description: Execute HP UFT tests from file system

inputs.name: testPathInput
inputs.label: Tests
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of tests or folders that contain tests, to run. Each line should contain a single test, folder, or MTB file.

inputs.name: timeOutIn
inputs.label: Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Timeout value in seconds. If left empty, there is no timeout.

inputs.name: pollInterval
inputs.label: Controller Polling Interval
inputs.helpMarkDown: Polling interval for checking the scenario status, in seconds. The default is 30 seconds.

inputs.name: executeTimeout
inputs.label: Scenario Execution Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum time allotted for scenario execution, in minutes.

inputs.name: ignoreErrors
inputs.label: Errors to Ignore
inputs.helpMarkDown: Ignore errors during the scenario run containing any of the strings listed below. For  example: "Error: CPU usage for this load generator has exceeded 80%"

inputs.name: useMC
inputs.label: Use SSL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Instructs the server to use SSL when connecting to the Mobile Center server.

inputs.name: mcUserNameIn
inputs.label: User name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user name for Mobile Center.

inputs.name: useProxy
inputs.label: Use proxy settings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Instructs the server to use the specified proxy settings when connecting to the Mobile Center server.

inputs.name: deviceId
inputs.label: Device ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The device ID number (provided by Mobile Center) for the device used in the test.

inputs.name: OS
inputs.label: OS
inputs.helpMarkDown: The operating system running on the device used in the test.

inputs.name: manufacturerAndModel
inputs.label: Manufacturer and model
inputs.helpMarkDown: The manufacturer and model of the device used in the test.

inputs.name: targetLab
inputs.label: Target lab
inputs.helpMarkDown: The target lab of the device used in the test. Select either AWS or Mobile Center.

inputs.name: extraApps
inputs.label: APPLICATION UNDER TEST
inputs.helpMarkDown: The apps that are included in the test.

inputs.name: launchApplicationName
inputs.label: Launch on start
inputs.helpMarkdown: The app to launch when the test run begins.

inputs.name: autPackaging
inputs.label: App packaging
inputs.helpMarkDown: Instructs the server to use the packaged or non-packaged version of the selected app.

inputs.name: autActions
inputs.label: App actions
inputs.helpMarkDown: The behavior of the apps included in the test.

inputs.name: deviceMetrics
inputs.label: Device metrics
inputs.helpMarkDown: The device metrics to track when running the test.

inputs.name: testsResult
inputs.label: Archive and publish HP tests results
inputs.helpMarkDown:
To UFT test result attached to the each Test case detailes in Test Run:
 Download the zipped report to your desired location and unzip it. In the HP Run Results Viewer, select the Results.xml file found inside the unzipped folder.
 Note that this option is valid only when using the "Execute HP test from file system" build step.

options.failed: Archive HP test report for failed tests
options.never: Do not archive HP test reports
